nodes.title: Added NO_SPACING formatting for variable concatenation using += operator
#771: Line continuations after assignments were not properly highlighted
#764: Variables declared in included files were not always properly resolved
#758: Fix completion which were displayed as "Invalid"
#735: properly resolve variables declared in a for loop
Remove optional dependency on JetBrains Shell.
2019.2 EAP: Show notification about new Shell plugin
Use OpenJDK8 as Oracle's JDK is causing issues on Travis
#662: Enter handler to insert a line continuation in Bash files
#656: Implement indexPatternBuilder to enable multiline fixme comments
#658: Fix broken highlighting of heredoc documents.
#486: Highlighting of composed variables within strings
#687: Fix highlighting of subshell and backtick commands
Fix compilation of test sources with newer SDKs
Use kotlin of the IJ SDK
preparing version 1.7.6, updates to the latest intellij-gradle plugin
re-enable tests (forgot to do this in #680)
Fix #677: Exception in idea.log of the latest CLion EAP
Fix #657: arithmetic shift right wasn't properly implemented
Variables declared by readarray are array vars
Fixed 'replace with double brackets' quick fix (fixes #664)
handle invalid paths in include file inspection
#636 handle parse errors in interpreter paths in run configurations
Support dumb mode in folding builder
Handle io exceptions when loading available commands from the filesystem
Add a project-wide default interpreter path
#611 try to load icons without causing "class not found" errors
Extension and refactoring of live templates
fix compilation with the different sdks
Add live templates for two kinds of "for" loops
#572 False-positive unresolved variables using names matching prefix …
Fix name validation for functions, resolve function name passed to "export -f"
add PisViewer plugin to more comfortable work with PSI
#400 Heredoc after command & is not parsed
#546 Color schemes: "Inherit values from" has no effect when checked
#522 Not a valid identifier in shell script with Bash functions with …
Add action to create a file type report for further debugging
Fix slow collection of command names at statup, improve completion rendering
add support of kotlin to project
#482: Make new Bash files executable for the current user by default
Don't parse in as keyword when used as variable
#551 Add default value of TERM when running a bash script
Make Bash run configurations dumb mode aware
Add inspection to check, whether function name is in lower camel case
Add inspection and quickfix to detect double brackets
Single build for IntelliJ builds 145.x to 182.x
#556 Add inspection for function names that should be lower case snake case
Fix broken headings in Markdown files
